translation: Being high up like this is nice, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Being high up like this is nice, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: If you like freezing.{#Name="Zero"}
source: If you like freezing.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Really? You're cold? It feels great to me.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Really? You're cold? It feels great to me.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Yeah, well, I'm not covered in scales and blubber.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah, well, I'm not covered in scales and blubber.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Uuurp... This is bad...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Uuurp... This is bad...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: What's wrong, Zero, did a wyvern get you?{LF}...Stupid wyverns!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: What's wrong, Zero, did a wyvern get you?{LF}...Stupid wyverns!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: No. You smell so bad, I think{LF}I'm gonna horf my lunch.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No. You smell so bad, I think{LF}I'm gonna horf my lunch.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's okay to barf on me, Zero!{LF}I don't mind!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: It's okay to barf on me, Zero!{LF}I don't mind!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Are you kidding me?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Are you kidding me?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: No wonder you reek so bad.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No wonder you reek so bad.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ha ha! Thanks!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Ha ha! Thanks!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: That wasn't a compliment!{#Name="Zero"}
source: That wasn't a compliment!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Wow. You're actually holding your{LF}own against these wyverns.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Wow. You're actually holding your{LF}own against these wyverns.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Who, me? Are you complimenting me!?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Who, me? Are you complimenting me!?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I guess dragons are pretty strong after all, huh?{#Name="Dito"}
source: I guess dragons are pretty strong after all, huh?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Hee heeeeee! You got that right!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hee heeeeee! You got that right!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Hey! Quit wagging your tail!{LF}You'll go off-balance.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hey! Quit wagging your tail!{LF}You'll go off-balance.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: And Dito, shut the hell up down there!{LF}You're not helping.{#Name="Zero"}
source: And Dito, shut the hell up down there!{LF}You're not helping.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ha ha ha ha ha ha!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Ha ha ha ha ha ha!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Boy, those are some thick clouds up ahead.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Boy, those are some thick clouds up ahead.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Weird. ...A little TOO weird.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Weird. ...A little TOO weird.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero! It's snowing too hard to see up ahead!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero! It's snowing too hard to see up ahead!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Nnngh...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Nnngh...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Should we try going around it?{LF}What do we do, Zero? ...Zero!?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Should we try going around it?{LF}What do we do, Zero? ...Zero!?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Agh! ...Dammit. It's so cold,{LF}I think my brain just froze.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Agh! ...Dammit. It's so cold,{LF}I think my brain just froze.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Well, snap out of it! We've still got{LF}dirty stinking wyverns to kill!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Well, snap out of it! We've still got{LF}dirty stinking wyverns to kill!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Hey, dummy... Why are you flying{LF}with your mouth open?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hey, dummy... Why are you flying{LF}with your mouth open?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Um...because then the snow goes in there?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Um...because then the snow goes in there?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: ...And?{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...And?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: And, um...it's cold and it's yummy and it's...fun?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: And, um...it's cold and it's yummy and it's...fun?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: ...AND?{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...AND?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I...I'm sorry! I'll focus on the battle!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I...I'm sorry! I'll focus on the battle!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Dammit, I can't see anything out here...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Dammit, I can't see anything out here...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: あ。ゼロさん、あぶない！{#Name="ディト"}
source: あ。ゼロさん、あぶない！{#Name="ディト"}

translation: ふー。間一髪か……。空中戦は気配を察することが難しいな{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ふー。間一髪か……。空中戦は気配を察することが難しいな{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: I guess we'll be seeing Four soon, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I guess we'll be seeing Four soon, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Yeah. She's got nowhere left to run.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah. She's got nowhere left to run.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Well, try to talk to her, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Well, try to talk to her, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: What?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You're sisters! If you guys talk, you might{LF}be able to understand each other better!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: You're sisters! If you guys talk, you might{LF}be able to understand each other better!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: We don't NEED to understand each other better.{#Name="Zero"}
source: We don't NEED to understand each other better.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Four's gonna be with her disciple, right?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Four's gonna be with her disciple, right?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Probably.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Probably.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I imagine that guy's got some serious issues.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I imagine that guy's got some serious issues.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I dunno, you think? Maybe he's just{LF}forced to be there like I was.{#Name="Dito"}
source: I dunno, you think? Maybe he's just{LF}forced to be there like I was.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: 僕みたいに{LF}しぶしぶウタヒメと一緒にいるのかもよ？{#Name="ディト"}
source: 僕みたいに{LF}しぶしぶウタヒメと一緒にいるのかもよ？{#Name="ディト"}

translation: ...Yeah, but you did the deed with Five, right?{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Yeah, but you did the deed with Five, right?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Uuuugh...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Uuuugh...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: It was awful, being knocked around by{LF}those giant punching bags every night...{#Name="Dito"}
source: It was awful, being knocked around by{LF}those giant punching bags every night...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Liar. You loved it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Liar. You loved it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You loved having her on her knees, begging you{LF}for more. It's written all over your face.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You loved having her on her knees, begging you{LF}for more. It's written all over your face.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Bullshit it is!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Bullshit it is!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Heh... He's got a temper, eh?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Heh... He's got a temper, eh?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Why are you mad at Four, Zero? Is it personal?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Why are you mad at Four, Zero? Is it personal?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Personal?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Personal?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Like, did she steal your ice cream{LF}as a kid or whatever?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Like, did she steal your ice cream{LF}as a kid or whatever?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: It's not about that. I just want her dead.{#Name="Zero"}
source: It's not about that. I just want her dead.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But why!?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: But why!?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: All sisters want to kill each other.{LF}Most just don't follow through.{#Name="Zero"}
source: All sisters want to kill each other.{LF}Most just don't follow through.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Seriously? THAT'S Four's daemon?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Seriously? THAT'S Four's daemon?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Looks more like a goddamn castle.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Looks more like a goddamn castle.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Look at all those cannons on the perimeter...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Look at all those cannons on the perimeter...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Circle in from below!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Circle in from below!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I can't! I can't!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I can't! I can't!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Why not!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Why not!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Those square ring thingies are magic!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Those square ring thingies are magic!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Her song's power is making it hard for me to fly!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Her song's power is making it hard for me to fly!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: It's pulling me in!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: It's pulling me in!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Great. Now we gotta take out{LF}all these freaking cannons...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Great. Now we gotta take out{LF}all these freaking cannons...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You just love messing with me,{LF}don't you, Four!{#Name="Zero"}
source: You just love messing with me,{LF}don't you, Four!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Why, my sister? Why do you hate me so?{#Name="Four"}
source: Why, my sister? Why do you hate me so?{#Name="Four"}

translation: I don't hate you. I just want to kill you.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I don't hate you. I just want to kill you.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But, why!? I don't understand!{#Name="Four"}
source: But, why!? I don't understand!{#Name="Four"}

translation: I feel kinda bad for her...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I feel kinda bad for her...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Shut it, would you!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Shut it, would you!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero, please! Snap out of this!{#Name="Four"}
source: Zero, please! Snap out of this!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Where's the kind, gentle Zero I once knew?{#Name="Four"}
source: Where's the kind, gentle Zero I once knew?{#Name="Four"}

translation: Beats me. I've always been like this.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Beats me. I've always been like this.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Just stop this already, Zero!{#Name="Four"}
source: Just stop this already, Zero!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Sorry. No can do.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Sorry. No can do.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I can't fight you, Zero.{LF}I don't want to fight you!{#Name="Four"}
source: I can't fight you, Zero.{LF}I don't want to fight you!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Fine by me. Then I'll kill you without a fight.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Fine by me. Then I'll kill you without a fight.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh, God... Someone, please...{LF}Wake me from this nightmare...{#Name="Four"}
source: Oh, God... Someone, please...{LF}Wake me from this nightmare...{#Name="Four"}

translation: Four and Decadus both seem like good people...{LF}I don't want to kill them.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Four and Decadus both seem like good people...{LF}I don't want to kill them.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Save it for someone who gives a shit.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Save it for someone who gives a shit.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: No, really! Look at us! If anyone's{LF}a bad guy here, it's us!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: No, really! Look at us! If anyone's{LF}a bad guy here, it's us!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: So, what? I can only kill evil people now?{LF}Is that what you're saying?{#Name="Zero"}
source: So, what? I can only kill evil people now?{LF}Is that what you're saying?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Guess what? In real life,{LF}bad guys win all the time.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Guess what? In real life,{LF}bad guys win all the time.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So quit bitching about your happy{LF}fantasy world before I kill you, too.{#Name="Zero"}
source: So quit bitching about your happy{LF}fantasy world before I kill you, too.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: うらあああっ！フォウ、どこだァ？出てこい！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: うらあああっ！フォウ、どこだァ？出てこい！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: 砲台は邪魔だ！邪魔だ！邪魔だ！{LF}邪魔だ！邪魔だ！邪魔だ～～～ッ！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 砲台は邪魔だ！邪魔だ！邪魔だ！{LF}邪魔だ！邪魔だ！邪魔だ～～～ッ！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: どんだけ逃げりゃ気がすむんだ？{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: どんだけ逃げりゃ気がすむんだ？{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: おとなしく死ねッ！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: おとなしく死ねッ！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Almost there!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Almost there!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Sit still, Sister. There's nowhere left to run!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Sit still, Sister. There's nowhere left to run!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ナントカ山上空{#Name="説明文"}
source: ナントカ山上空{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Destroy all of Armaros' eyes!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Destroy all of Armaros' eyes!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat Armaros!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat Armaros!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: 全てのアルマロスの瞳を撃破した！{#Name="説明文"}
source: 全てのアルマロスの瞳を撃破した！{#Name="説明文"}

translation: アルマロスを撃破した！{#Name="説明文"}
source: アルマロスを撃破した！{#Name="説明文"}

translation: お。おい！フォウが逃げるぞ！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: お。おい！フォウが逃げるぞ！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ダメだよ！ゼロ！アルマロスが倒せない！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ダメだよ！ゼロ！アルマロスが倒せない！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: 予備{#Name="予備"}
source: 予備{#Name="予備"}

translation: ゼロッ！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ゼロッ！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: よし、ここまでで充分だ。{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: よし、ここまでで充分だ。{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: えっ？　ゼロ！　どこへ行く気！？{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: えっ？　ゼロ！　どこへ行く気！？{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: Zero... At last, my wayward sister finally arrives.{#Name="Four"}
source: Zero... At last, my wayward sister finally arrives.{#Name="Four"}

translation: Yeah, it took a while.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah, it took a while.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: All your chickenshit running around didn't help.{LF}Sit still so I can kill you quick.{#Name="Zero"}
source: All your chickenshit running around didn't help.{LF}Sit still so I can kill you quick.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I...I have no wish to fight you, Sister.{#Name="Four"}
source: I...I have no wish to fight you, Sister.{#Name="Four"}

translation: Oh?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Oh?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Don't you know how much I admire you, Zero? I always have!{#Name="Four"}
source: Don't you know how much I admire you, Zero? I always have!{#Name="Four"}

translation: This can't end in bloodshed! It can't!{#Name="Four"}
source: This can't end in bloodshed! It can't!{#Name="Four"}

translation: You bet your ass it can! You think I came{LF}all the way here for a fucking picnic?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You bet your ass it can! You think I came{LF}all the way here for a fucking picnic?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'm not leaving until I've strewn your{LF}virgin guts all over the goddamned snow!{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm not leaving until I've strewn your{LF}virgin guts all over the goddamned snow!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You can't... You can't...{#Name="Four"}
source: You can't... You can't...{#Name="Four"}

translation: You caaaaaaaaaaaan't!{#Name="Four"}
source: You caaaaaaaaaaaan't!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Behold the fourth song:{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Behold the fourth song:{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Impenetrable Shield of Antiquity!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Impenetrable Shield of Antiquity!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: The rare power granted to our own...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: The rare power granted to our own...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: The stout citadel that protects us...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: The stout citadel that protects us...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Cast your blighted sins upon these very skies!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Cast your blighted sins upon these very skies!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I, Decadus, summon thee in my name...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I, Decadus, summon thee in my name...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Armaros, uphold!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Armaros, uphold!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Remember when those boys used to bully me, Zero?{#Name="Four"}
source: Remember when those boys used to bully me, Zero?{#Name="Four"}

translation: I would cry, and you'd stay with me{LF}until I felt better...{#Name="Four"}
source: I would cry, and you'd stay with me{LF}until I felt better...{#Name="Four"}

translation: I think you got the wrong girl.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I think you got the wrong girl.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: No! That's who you really are! You must remember!{#Name="Four"}
source: No! That's who you really are! You must remember!{#Name="Four"}

translation: We must find a way to make peace!{LF}For that precious dragon's sake, if nothing else.{#Name="Four"}
source: We must find a way to make peace!{LF}For that precious dragon's sake, if nothing else.{#Name="Four"}

translation: {#Name="フォウ"}
source: {#Name="フォウ"}

translation: Will you shut up already!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Will you shut up already!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: If I die here, my disciple will soon follow.{#Name="Four"}
source: If I die here, my disciple will soon follow.{#Name="Four"}

translation: An Intoner and her disciple{LF}are united by a mystical bond!{#Name="Four"}
source: An Intoner and her disciple{LF}are united by a mystical bond!{#Name="Four"}

translation: A mystical bond? It's called sex.{LF}There's nothing mystical about it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: A mystical bond? It's called sex.{LF}There's nothing mystical about it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {#Name="Four"}
source: {#Name="Four"}

translation: Don't... Don't say such things to me, Sister!{#Name="Four"}
source: Don't... Don't say such things to me, Sister!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Besides, your disciple will be fine.{LF}After you die, I'll just ball his brains out.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Besides, your disciple will be fine.{LF}After you die, I'll just ball his brains out.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Stooooooppp iiitttttt!{#Name="Four"}
source: Stooooooppp iiitttttt!{#Name="Four"}

translation: How long do you plan to keep running, Four?{#Name="Zero"}
source: How long do you plan to keep running, Four?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Just lay down and die already!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Just lay down and die already!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You can never defeat me, Sister!{#Name="Four"}
source: You can never defeat me, Sister!{#Name="Four"}

translation: Really? You saying you don't have ANY weaknesses?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Really? You saying you don't have ANY weaknesses?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh, all of us have weaknesses.{LF}But I will never reveal mine.{#Name="Four"}
source: Oh, all of us have weaknesses.{LF}But I will never reveal mine.{#Name="Four"}

translation: That's because I can keep myself{LF}calm...unlike you.{#Name="Four"}
source: That's because I can keep myself{LF}calm...unlike you.{#Name="Four"}

translation: We'll see about that, you little prude.{#Name="Zero"}
source: We'll see about that, you little prude.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Wha!?{#Name="Four"}
source: Wha!?{#Name="Four"}

translation: Tell me, are you saving yourself?{LF}Or do you just stink down there?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Tell me, are you saving yourself?{LF}Or do you just stink down there?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Stop! Stop it! Don't say that!{LF}Don't say such things!{#Name="Four"}
source: Stop! Stop it! Don't say that!{LF}Don't say such things!{#Name="Four"}

translation: よしっ！全部破壊したなっ！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: よしっ！全部破壊したなっ！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: She's getting away!{#Name="Zero"}
source: She's getting away!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Goddamn, she's stubborn!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Goddamn, she's stubborn!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Time's up, Four.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Time's up, Four.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: If you want to say a little something before you go, now's the time.{#Name="Zero"}
source: If you want to say a little something before you go, now's the time.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Four"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Four"}

translation: I...I won't let you harm Lady Four!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I...I won't let you harm Lady Four!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Stop... S-Stop... I have to...kill her!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Stop... S-Stop... I have to...kill her!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: N-No...{#Name="Zero"}
source: N-No...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Don't come out... Not now...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Don't come out... Not now...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Where am I?{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Where am I?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Z-Zero?{#Name="Four"}
source: Z-Zero?{#Name="Four"}

translation: Four?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Four?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Decadus"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Why am I... What's going on?{LF}...Where are we?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Why am I... What's going on?{LF}...Where are we?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh, Zero!{#Name="Four"}
source: Oh, Zero!{#Name="Four"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Decadus"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: You're here! You came back! It's really you, isn't it!?{#Name="Four"}
source: You're here! You came back! It's really you, isn't it!?{#Name="Four"}

translation: What happened? What about our sisters? Where are they?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What happened? What about our sisters? Where are they?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Everything's going to be okay.{LF}We don't have to fight anymore, Zero.{#Name="Four"}
source: Everything's going to be okay.{LF}We don't have to fight anymore, Zero.{#Name="Four"}

translation: Everyone else is waiting for you.{#Name="Four"}
source: Everyone else is waiting for you.{#Name="Four"}

translation: ...Where are they waiting?{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Where are they waiting?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Three's in the Land of Forests, and Two's in the Land of Sands.{LF}They're both—{#Name="Four"}
source: Three's in the Land of Forests, and Two's in the Land of Sands.{LF}They're both—{#Name="Four"}

translation: Thanks for the info.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Thanks for the info.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: N-No... I thought you were...back...{#Name="Four"}
source: N-No... I thought you were...back...{#Name="Four"}

translation: I can't believe you fell for that bullshit!{#Name="Zero"}
source: I can't believe you fell for that bullshit!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You honestly thought I'd have a split personality!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You honestly thought I'd have a split personality!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Stupid son of a{#Name="Zero"}
source: Stupid son of a{#Name="Zero"}

translation: BITCH!{#Name="Zero"}
source: BITCH!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Please. Kill me as well.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Please. Kill me as well.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I kill my sisters. I TAKE their men.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I kill my sisters. I TAKE their men.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Decadus"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Go clean up. Front AND rear. We meet tonight.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Go clean up. Front AND rear. We meet tonight.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Decadus"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Front...AND rear?{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Front...AND rear?{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: So who's next? Three, huh?{#Name="Zero"}
source: So who's next? Three, huh?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Decadus"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Two Intoners down...three to go.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Two Intoners down...three to go.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Wait a second. Dummy, come here.{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Wait a second. Dummy, come here.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Don't you look...different from before?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Don't you look...different from before?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Different? ...GYA!{LF}What the heck!?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Different? ...GYA!{LF}What the heck!?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Whoa.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Whoa.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Whoooa!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Whoooa!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Whoooooooooa.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Whoooooooooa.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Lots of wyverns around here.{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Lots of wyverns around here.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Must be Four's song at work.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Must be Four's song at work.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Stupid wyverns. Just a buncha{LF}low-class dragon wannabes!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Stupid wyverns. Just a buncha{LF}low-class dragon wannabes!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: They can't even talk!{LF}Or understand language!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: They can't even talk!{LF}Or understand language!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: And don't get me started{LF}on those pathetic wings...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: And don't get me started{LF}on those pathetic wings...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Come on! Let's roast these wyverns!{LF}Let's roast 'em ALL!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Come on! Let's roast these wyverns!{LF}Let's roast 'em ALL!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: ...Wow. You're like a different beast{LF}when you're talking about wyverns.{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Wow. You're like a different beast{LF}when you're talking about wyverns.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ha ha! Thanks!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Ha ha! Thanks!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: That wasn't a compliment.{#Name="Zero"}
source: That wasn't a compliment.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: What's that?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What's that?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Looks like a rock.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Looks like a rock.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: ...They're attacking us with ROCKS?{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...They're attacking us with ROCKS?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: See? I told you wyverns were stupid!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: See? I told you wyverns were stupid!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: That really means something coming from you...{#Name="Zero"}
source: That really means something coming from you...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero! We're gonna get sucked in!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero! We're gonna get sucked in!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Just stay calm and watch where you're aiming!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Just stay calm and watch where you're aiming!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Take down that tower! It's pulling you in!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Take down that tower! It's pulling you in!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hurry up and destroy it before{LF}it pulls you in completely!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hurry up and destroy it before{LF}it pulls you in completely!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The target's too small! It's hard to hit!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: The target's too small! It's hard to hit!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Damn it, Four. Could you BE more annoying?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Damn it, Four. Could you BE more annoying?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Urrrgh... It's moving too fast for me to hit!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Urrrgh... It's moving too fast for me to hit!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Shut up and keep firing! She's getting away!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Shut up and keep firing! She's getting away!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Don't let her get away!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Don't let her get away!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's no good, Zero! We can't beat him!{LF}We can't beat him!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: It's no good, Zero! We can't beat him!{LF}We can't beat him!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: クソッ。魔力が集まってる……{LF}さっさと倒さないとマズイぞっ！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: クソッ。魔力が集まってる……{LF}さっさと倒さないとマズイぞっ！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: うああああっ！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: うああああっ！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: くそっ！フォウに逃げられる……！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: くそっ！フォウに逃げられる……！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Destroy the flying fortress.{#Name="目的文"}
source: Destroy the flying fortress.{#Name="目的文"}
